executiveSummary: Strategic product leader with extensive experience in driving innovation through AI/ML, market research, and data-driven decision making. Proven track record of building scalable products, leading cross-functional teams, and executing successful go-to-market strategies. Passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex business challenges and create meaningful impact.

achievements: Led product strategy for AI/ML initiatives resulting in 40% improvement in key metrics
Managed cross-functional teams of 15+ members across engineering, design, and data science
Executed GTM strategy that increased market penetration by 60%
Conducted comprehensive market research identifying $50M+ opportunity
experience.description: Strategic leadership role focusing on product innovation, AI/ML integration, and market expansion.
